Package src.brick_strategies

Class AddPaddleStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.brick_strategies.RemoveBrickStrategyDecorator
      • src.brick_strategies.AddPaddleStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionStrategy
    public class AddPaddleStrategy
extends RemoveBrickStrategyDecorator
    Concrete class extending abstract RemoveBrickStrategyDecorator. Introduces extra paddle to game window which remains until colliding NUM_COLLISIONS_FOR_MOCK_PADDLE_DISAPPEARANCE with other game objects.
